FuncDef: The display inof information host command displays information about hosts managed by devices on the iNOF network. The display inof information host command displays information about hosts managed by devices on the iNOF network. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
CLIs: display inof information host [ local | remote | { <ip-address> | <ipv6-address> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies information about hosts connected to the local device.
-

Specifies host information learned from the reflector.
-

Specifies the IPv4 address of a host.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the IPv6 address of a host.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.
